TITLE.CONNECT_WALLET: You must connect a wallet first!
TITLE.NOT_MINTABLE: You cannot mint this Ofuda. To get this Ofuda you need to meet a certain criteria.
TITLE.IS_POSSIBLE_START: You can get it on January 10, 2024 at 12:00 pm.

OMAMORI_EXPLANATION:
Here, you can mint a message "Ofuda" which contains a wish for each of them.
Minting an "Ofuda" will result in a "Omamori" NFT.
This process is automated using smart contracts and is confirmed and verified on the blockchain.
MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION:
※The message with your wish is contained in the "Omamori" NFT as an "Ofuda".
1 year later, the "Ofuda" will be released at the time of the burning of the "Omamori".
